column1: # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=There is a bus stop down the street from my house .
#text=If you take it going south , it leads to the city , and if you take it going north , it leads to the next suburban town .
#text=I needed to go to the city , so I went to the bus stop and waited .
#text=I waited about ten minutes and then the bus came .
#text=It wheezed to a stop near me and then the door opened .
#text=I walked into the bus and up the short flight of stairs toward the driver .
#text=I had just enough change on me to pay the fare .
#text=I fed my coins into the slot where you put your money and then walked to the left and down the aisle to find my seat .
#text=I passed the front seats , which are intended for older or handicapped passengers , and took a seat about halfway down the bus , next to the window .
#text=When I saw that my stop would be next , I pulled the yellow cord that runs along the side of the bus .
#text=That makes a beep and signals the driver that someone wants to get off the bus .
#text=The beep sounded and the bus driver pulled over to the side of the road at the next bus stop .
#text=I got up and went to the rear door of the bus , walked down the stairs , and walked out onto the sidewalk .
